Message.EnterTheFollowinglink: Enter the following secure link to verify.
Message.AnErrorOccurred: An error occurred, please try again
Message.InvalidEmailOrTries: Email is not invited or limit of tries exceeded
Message.EnablePermissions: Go to settings to enable permissions

of the identity verification

The button below will start the
process, you will integrate this
button with your App.

Setting.Title: Configuration
Setting.LogoParameters: Upload your logo with max 500KB size and 180x40px as .png or .jpg
Setting.Heading: Heading

Invite.Title:
Welcome to
Preventor ID
Invite.SubTitle:
Enter your email invitation
on the input below.

LetsGetYouVerified.Title: Let's get you verified

Option1.Label: OPTION 1
Option1.Title: Scan the QR code
Option1.Description: Scan the QR code with your camera app.

Option2.Label: OPTION 2
Option2.Title: Send link via SMS
Option2.Description: We’ll text a secure link to your mobile at no extra cost.

PrepareDocument.Title: Prepare a valid document
PrepareDocument.Description: Make sure it’s not expired or physically damaged.

UseSmartphone.Title: Use a smartphone
UseSmartphone.Description: You need a smartphone in order to continue.

LetsGetYouVerified.PrivacyPolicy: Read more about your personal data processing in Preventor’s privacy policy.

SecureLinkSent.Title: Check your mobile
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle: We’ve sent a secure link to
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle2: It may take a few minutes to arrive.

Start.Title: Start your identity verification
Start.SubTitle: We'll walk you through a seamless process to verify your identity

PrepareSteps.Title: Prepare for identity verification

Steps.Step1: Prepare your government-issued ID to be scanned.
Steps.Step2: Position yourself in good light for a selfie.
Steps.Step3: Have your email address ready to be verified.
Steps.Step4: Have your mobile phone ready to be verified.

PrepareSteps.Agreements: By cickling continue you agree with the terms of service and our privacy policy.

ChooseCountry.Title:
From which country 
is your document?
ChooseCountry.SubTitle: Please select the country from the dropdown list.

ChooseDocument.Title: Choose the type of document
ChooseDocument.SubTitle: Please select the type of government-issued ID from the dropdown list.

Passport.Title: Get ready to scan your passport
Passport.SubTitle: Open the page showing your personal information and continue on the next screen.

DriverLicense.Title: Get ready to scan your driver license
DriverLicense.SubTitle: Prepare your driver license to take a picture of the front and back and continue on the next screen.

IdCard.Title: Get ready to scan your national ID card
IdCard.SubTitle: Prepare your ID card to take a picture of the front and back and continue on the next screen.

Visa.Title: Get ready to scan your visa
Visa.SubTitle: Open the page showing your personal information and continue on the next screen.

Global.Title: Get ready to scan your identity document
Global.SubTitle: Prepare your identity document to take a picture of the front or back and continue on the next screen.

GlobalDocument.SubTitle2: Please ensure all data is readable and avoid reflections.

PrepareSelfie.Title: Get ready for your selfie
PrepareSelfie.SubTitle: Position yourself in good lighting and follow instructions on the next screen.

Outside.Title: Match circles
Outside.SubTitle: Face not detected, position your face inside the circle

Far.Title: Match circles
Far.SubTitle: Face not detected, position your face inside the circle

TryAgainDocument.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainDocument.SubTitle: But first, please make sure you take the photo in a well-lit flat surface.

TryAgainSelfie.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainSelfie.SubTitle: But first, please make sure you are in good light environment, use neutral expression, no smiling, no glare or extreme lighting.

Email.Title: What is your email address?
Email.SubTitle: We'll send a verification code to this email.

EmailVerification.Title: Verify your email address
EmailVerification.SubTitle: We’ve sent a verification code to

Phone.Title: What is your mobile phone number?
Phone.SubTitle: We'll send a verification code to this number.

PhoneVerification.Title: Verify your mobile phone number
PhoneVerification.SubTitle: We’ve sent a verification code to

IdentityVerificationSubmitted.Title: Your identity verification has been submitted
IdentityVerificationSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

StreamLineSubmitted.Title: Your digital onboarding has been submitted
StreamLineSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

SubTitle.IdentityVerification: Your identity verification has been completed.
SubTitle.Streamline: Your streamline digital onboarding has been completed.

DeniedAccessCamera.Title: You have denied access to your camera
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMicroFrontEnd: In order to continue, please enable access to your camera in your browser settings.
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMobile: In order to continue, please enable access to your camera in your phone settings.

CancelVerification.Title: Cancel verification
CancelVerification.SubTitle:
This may impact your ability to access the service.

Are you sure to continue?
